title: Un Jeune Couple = a Young Couple
brief_description:
Veronique is the impetuous party girl who falls for Gilles, a liberal-minded engineer with little ambition. The odd couple marries, but trouble begins, after the birth of their child. See also: ‘Sept jours ailleurs’ [X000417].

Credits: Producer, J. Loris ; director, Rene Gainville ; writer, Jean-Louis Curtis ; photography, Roger Fellous ; music, Jacques Lacome.
Cast: Anne Gael, Anny Duperey, Alain Libolt, Corinne Le Poulain, Jean-Francois Calve.
